name: Basketball Orbit
description:
NEW CHARACTERS INCOMING!
We need you: Which Crazy cool character do you want to play?

Leave your suggestion in the comments below :p
Best ideas will be designed
Be creative!!

Shoot as far as possible, improve your skills and shoot even further! If you shoot really far you might even land on another planet!!

SUBSCRIPTION TERMS AND CONDITIONS:

VIP Subscription offers a weekly subscription for $7.99 after a 3 day free trail. Upon purchase of this subscription, you will immediately receive:
- No ads
- 5 exclusive basketball players
- Triple coins collected in-game

Your subscription automatically renews. The payment is charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase. unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal at the price listed within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off via Settings > App and iTunes Stores > Apple ID > View Apple ID. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Terms of Use: https://pinpinteam.com/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://pinpinteam.com/privacy
